#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{  int t=1;
    while(t==1)
    {
        int a,b;
        scanf("%d%d",&a,&b);
        if(a==0&&b==0)
            break;
        int m=0,z=0,x;
        while(a>0&&b>0)
        {
            x=a%10+b%10+z;
            if(x>9)
                {
                    x=x/10;
                    m++;
                    z=x;
                }
            a=a/10;
            b=b/10;
        }
        if(m==0)
        {
            printf("No carry operation.\n");
            continue;
        }
        if(m==1)
        {
            printf("1 carry operation.\n");
            continue;
        }
        else printf("%d carry operations.\n",m);
    }
    return 0;
}
